name: ParadeDB
title: paradedb.com
payoff: Zero ETL search and analytics for Postgres
shortDescription: ParadeDB transforms Postgres into a powerful search and analytics engine, eliminating the need for Elasticsearch. It is designed for real-time, update-heavy workloads, making it ideal for businesses that require efficient data handling without the complexity of syncing systems. An example use case is a tech company looking to implement real-time search capabilities within their existing Postgres databases without additional infrastructure.
cons: May not have the full feature set of Elasticsearch
Dependent on the scalability of the underlying Postgres setup
